Test Steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected Result:
The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Sepolia.

Test Steps: Open the test dapp in another tab.
Proceed to Deploy the NFT contract.
Confirm the transaction and wait for it to complete.
Confirm the transaction and wait for it to complete.

Expected Result:
The NFT is shown in the wallets NFTs list.
The NFT image is shown.

Test Steps: Close the test dapp and switch back to the wallet.
Change the asset to the newly added NFT.
Expected Result:
The TestDappNFTs NFT is shown in the asset field on the send flow.
The specified NFT symbol is shown.

The specified NFT token id is shown.

The recipient's hexadecimal address is shown.

The specified NFT image is shown.

The estimated gas details are shown.
The total amount is shown.

The transaction appears in the activity list.
The amount is shown in the activity list item.
